issue.title: [C++][CI] Running Gandiva tests fails on Fedora 29
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7115](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7115). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reproduce with `docker-compose run -e ARROW_GANDIVA=ON fedora-cpp`

```Java

Running gandiva-internals-test, redirecting output into /build/cpp/build/test-logs/gandiva-internals-test.txt (attempt 1/1)
1364
: CommandLine Error: Option 'x86-experimental-vector-widening-legalization' registered more than once!
1365
LLVM ERROR: inconsistency in registered CommandLine options
1366
/build/cpp/src/gandiva
```
